Unapproved IEEE Draft Standard Definitions for Excitation Systems for Synchronous Machines (Revision of IEEE 412.1-1986)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Review and update the definitions of excitation systems terminology, and the supporting bibliography and figures of typical excitation system configurations.
